value.name: Hysteria
value.overview: An investigative thriller about a haunted young doctor who is summoned back to her hometown to investigate an epidemic that may be linked to social media - and her own tragic past.

value.name: Hysteria!
value.overview: When a beloved varsity quarterback disappears during the "Satanic Panic" of the late 1980s, a struggling high school heavy metal band of outcasts realize they can capitalize on the town's sudden interest in the occult by building a reputation as a Satanic metal band, until a bizarre series of murders, kidnappings, and reported "supernatural activity" triggers a leather-studded witch hunt that leads directly back to them.

value.name: Hysteria
value.overview: Ghasaq, a college student who comes from a rich family, falls in love with her colleague Sajjad. However, her family does not approve of their relationship, and the unexpected happens.
